mapper.select: SELECT bno, btitle,bcontent, bdate, secret, commentYN, comment, bdel, uname FROM onlineview WHERE uno = #{uno} and bdel = '1' ORDER BY bno DESC LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{post};
SELECT o.uid, o.btitle, o.bcontent, o.bdate, o.commentYN,o.bdel FROM onlineview o join user u on o.uid = u.uid WHERE o.uid = (select uid from user where uid = {#uid}) ORDER BY o.bdate DESC;
select count(*) from online where user_no = #{uno} and bdel = "1" ;

SELECT gs.PRG_NO as prg_no, gs.PRG_NM as prg_nm, gs.PRG_YMD as prg_ymd, gs.PRG_HR as prg_hr, gs.PRG_PLACE as prg_place FROM groupSchedule_view gs JOIN graply gr ON gr.grsch_no = gs.GRSCH_NO WHERE gr.stud_no = #{stud_no} GROUP BY gs.PRG_NO, gs.PRG_NM, gs.PRG_YMD, gs.PRG_HR, gs.PRG_PLACE ORDER BY gs.PRG_NO;
